languages.text: Наследник династии фон Валанциус, малодушно отказавшись от великой чести принять Торговый Патент, был милостиво отпущен восвояси. После того, как {name} был{mf||а} спущен{mf||а} на шаттле на поверхность Райкад Минорис, {mf|его|ее} след затерялся навсегда. Скорее всего, если до преемни{mf|ка|цы} Теодоры не успели добраться убийцы Кунрада Войгтвира, {mf|он|она} наверняка сгорел{mf||а} в пламени чудовищных событий, что ждали мир-улей...

The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...
languages.original_text: Наследник династии фон Валанциус, малодушно отказавшись от великой чести принять Торговый Патент, был милостиво отпущен восвояси. После того, как {name} был{mf||а} спущен{mf||а} на шаттле на поверхность Райкад Минорис, {mf|его|ее} след затерялся навсегда. Скорее всего, если до преемни{mf|ка|цы} Теодоры не успели добраться убийцы Кунрада Войгтвира, {mf|он|она} наверняка сгорел{mf||а} в пламени чудовищных событий, что ждали мир-улей...

After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...

The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的继承人不愿继承贸易授状，怯懦地放弃了伟大的荣耀。如今，{name}被仁慈地放了出去，离开了飞船。当{mf|他|她}被穿梭机送到小莱卡德行星表面之后，{mf|他|她}的踪迹就彻底消失了。就算西奥多拉的这位继承人没有被昆拉德·维特威尔派出的刺客干掉，恐怕也会被席卷了整个巢都世界的滔天烈焰吞噬殆尽……
languages.original_text: The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的继承人不愿继承贸易许可证，怯懦地放弃了伟大的荣耀。如今，{name}被仁慈地放了出去，离开了飞船。当{mf|他|她}被穿梭机送到小莱卡德行星表面之后，{mf|他|她}的踪迹就彻底消失了。就算西奥多拉的这位继承人没有被昆拉德·维特威尔派出的刺客干掉，恐怕也会被席卷了整个巢都世界的滔天烈焰吞噬殆尽……

languages.text: {mf|El|La} hereder{mf|o|a} de la dinastía von Valancius, que rechazó cobardemente el gran honor de la Patente de Comercio, fue liberad{mf|o|a}. Después de que una lanzadera llevara a {name} a la superficie de Rykad Minoris, su rastro desapareció. Si {mf|el|la} sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora no fue víctima de los asesinos de Kunrad Voigtvir, probablemente perdiera la vida en los monstruosos sucesos que esperaban al mundo colmena...
languages.original_text: The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} hereder{mf|o|a} de la dinastía von Valancius, que rechazó cobardemente el gran honor de la Patente de Comercio, fue liberad{mf|o|a}. Después de que una lanzadera llevara a {name} a la superficie de Rykad Minoris, su rastro desapareció. Si {mf|el|la} sucesor{mf||a} de Theodora no fue víctima de los asesinos de Kunrad Voigtvir, probablemente perdiera la vida en los monstruosos sucesos que esperaban al mundo colmena...

languages.text: 通商許可証を受領するという偉大なる栄誉を拒んだフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の後継者は、慈悲深くも解放された。{name}がシャトルでライカド・ミノリスの地表へと移されたあと、その痕跡は永遠に失われた。もしシオドーラの後継者が、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルのアサシンに追跡されたのでなければ、おそらくは過密惑星へと降りかかることになる、凶悪な事件の炎に焼かれてしまったのだろう…
languages.original_text: The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...

traits.locale_text: 通商保証書を受領するという偉大なる栄誉を拒んだフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の後継者は、慈悲深くも解放された。{name}がシャトルでライカド・ミノリスの地表へと移されたあと、その痕跡は永遠に失われた。もしシオドーラの後継者が、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルのアサシンに追跡されたのでなければ、おそらくは過密惑星へと降りかかることになる、凶悪な事件の炎に焼かれてしまったのだろう…

languages.text: L'{mf|héritier|héritière} de la dynastie von Valancius, qui a lâchement refusé l'honneur d'accepter la lettre de marque, a eu la chance d'avoir la vie sauve. Après avoir été {mf|transporté|transportée} par navette sur Rykad Minoris, {name} s'est tout simplement {mf|volatilisé|volatilisée}. Si les assassins de Kunrad Voigtvir ne sont pas parvenus à retrouver la trace {mf|du successeur|de la successeure} de Théodora, c'est probablement parce qu'{mf|il|elle} a été {mf|consumé|consumée} par les flammes des événements monstrueux survenus sur le monde ruche...
languages.original_text: The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...

traits.locale_text: L'{mf|héritier|héritière} de la dynastie von Valancius, qui a lâchement refusé l'honneur d'accepter la lettre de marque, a eu la chance d'avoir la vie sauve. Après avoir été {mf|transporté|transportée} par navette sur Rykad Minoris, {name} s'est tout simplement {mf|volatilisé|volatilisée}. Si les assassins de Kunrad Voigtvir ne sont pas parvenus à retrouver la trace {mf|du successeur|de la successeure} de Théodora, c'est probablement parce qu'{mf|il|elle} a été {mf|consumé|consumée} par les flammes des événements monstrueux survenus sur le monde ruche...

languages.text: {mf|Der Erbe der Dynastie derer von Valancius, der|Die Erbin der Dynastie derer von Valancius, die} die große Ehre der Verleihung des Handelsbriefs abgelehnt hat, wurde gnädigerweise gehen gelassen. Nachdem {name} per Shuttle auf die Oberfläche von Rykad Minoris gebracht wurde, verliert sich {mf|seine|ihre} Spur für immer. Wenn Theodoras {mf|Nachfolger|Nachfolgerin} nicht von Kunrad Voigtvirs Mördern aufgespürt wurde, dann wurde {mf|er|sie} vermutlich von den Feuern der grauenhaften Ereignisse verschlungen, die die Makropolwelt heimsuchen sollten ...
languages.original_text: The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Erbe der Dynastie derer von Valancius, der|Die Erbin der Dynastie derer von Valancius, die} die große Ehre der Verleihung des Handelsbriefs abgelehnt hat, wurde gnädigerweise gehen gelassen. Nachdem {name} per Shuttle auf die Oberfläche von Rykad Minoris gebracht wurde, verliert sich {mf|seine|ihre} Spur für immer. Wenn Theodoras {mf|Nachfolger|Nachfolgerin} nicht von Kunrad Voigtvirs Mördern aufgespürt wurde, dann wurde {mf|er|sie} vermutlich von den Feuern der grauenhaften Ereignisse verschlungen, die die Makropolwelt heimsuchen sollten ...

languages.text: Von Valancius hanedanlığının vârisine, korkaklık edip Ticari Ruhsatname'yi kabul etme onurunu reddetmesi sonrası merhamet gösterildi. Mekikle Rykad Minoris'in yüzeyine indirilen {name}, izini sonsuza dek kaybettirdi. Kunrad Voigtvir'in suikastçıları eğer Theodora'nın vârisini bulamadıysa bunun sebebi, muhtemelen kovan dünyada meydana gelen korkunç olaylarda can verip gitmiş olmasıdır...
languages.original_text: The heir to the von Valancius dynasty, who cravenly refused the great honour of accepting the Warrant of Trade, was mercifully let go. After {name} was transported by shuttle to the surface of Rykad Minoris, {mf|his|her} trail was lost forever. If Theodora's successor was not tracked down by Kunrad Voigtvir's assassins, {mf|he|she} most likely was consumed by the fires of the monstrous events that were to befall the hive world...
